name: ColorMeQpid
description:
You are a Cupid. Love's not been in the air, so you best go do your job.

Due to the low fertility rate in Pajan and the low belief system that resulted in the disappearance of many gods and spirits, a cupid founds the Colour me Qpid, a private organization that replaces said gods and spirits as a new faith/belief system.

Play as one of the best cupid in the service, alongside his hot-tempered attitude and short attention span.

Features:

  • Romance
  • Storytelling
  • Visual Novel

Controls:

It's a visual novel, so you just need your mouse really  :p

Team credits:

Octávio Silva (Narrative/Dialogue Writer/ Programmer)

Jason Morgado (Sprite Art / Logo Design)

Bautista Nicolas (Programing/Narrative Writing)

Sara Bastos (Background Art)
